title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic
Technique: embroidery
description: All-over embroidery of green leaves on metallic stems. The piece may have been made up as a chausable but that was not its first use as the design on the fabric is at right angles to the lines of a chausable.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.Medium: silk and metallic
Technique: embroidery. 1898-2-7.
